authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a user

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a user

options.name: Get
options.description: Get data of a user

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get data of many users

options.name: Me
options.description: Get data of authenticated user

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a user

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

accountId.name: accountId
accountId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
accountId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: is_active
options.description: Whether to only return active users and false to return inactive users

options.name: updated_since
options.description: Only return users belonging to the user with the given ID

options.name: page
options.description: The page number to use in pagination

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the time entry to update
id.ai_hint: The ID of the time entry to update

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: can_create_invoices
options.description: Whether the user can create invoices. Only applicable to Project Managers.

options.name: can_create_projects
options.description: Whether the user can create projects. Only applicable to Project Managers.

options.name: can_see_rates
options.description: Whether the user can see billable rates on projects. Only applicable to Project Managers.

options.name: cost_rate
options.description: The cost rate to use for this user when calculating a project’s costs vs billable amount

options.name: default_hourly_rate
options.description: The billable rate to use for this user when they are added to a project

options.displayName: Has Access To All Future Projects
options.name: has_access_to_all_future_projects
options.description: Whether the user should be automatically added to future projects

options.name: is_active
options.description: Whether the user is active or archived

options.name: is_admin
options.description: Whether the user has Admin permissions

options.name: is_contractor
options.description: Whether the user is a contractor or an employee

options.name: is_project_manager
options.description: Whether the user has Project Manager permissions

options.name: roles
options.description: The role names assigned to this person

options.name: timezone
options.description: The user’s timezone. Defaults to the company’s timezone. See a list of supported time zones.

options.name: weekly_capacity
options.description: The number of hours per week this person is available to work in seconds. Defaults to 126000 seconds (35 hours).

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.description: The first name of the user
firstName.ai_hint: The first name of the user

clientId.name: clientId
clientId.description: The ID of the client to associate this project with
clientId.ai_hint: The ID of the client to associate this project with

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: The ID of the project to associate with the time entry
projectId.ai_hint: The ID of the project to associate with the time entry

expenseCategoryId.name: expenseCategoryId
expenseCategoryId.description: The ID of the expense category this expense is being tracked against
expenseCategoryId.ai_hint: The ID of the expense category this expense is being tracked against

spentDate.name: spentDate
spentDate.description: The ISO 8601 formatted date the time entry was spent
spentDate.ai_hint: The ISO 8601 formatted date the time entry was spent

isBillable.name: isBillable
isBillable.description: Whether the project is billable or not

billBy.name: billBy
billBy.description: The method by which the project is invoiced
billBy.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

budgetBy.name: budgetBy
budgetBy.description: The email of the user or "none"
budgetBy.ai_hint: The email of the user or "none"

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.description: The ID of the task to associate with the time entry
taskId.ai_hint: The ID of the task to associate with the time entry

lastName.name: lastName
lastName.description: The last name of the user
lastName.ai_hint: The last name of the user

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'client' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'company' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'contact' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'estimate' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'expense' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'invoice' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'timeEntry' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'client' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'client' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'client' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'client' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'client' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'client' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'client' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'client' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'client' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'

IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'contact' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
